animes.name: Death Note
animes.short_description: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that grants him the power to kill anyone by writing their name in it.

animes.name: Fullmetal Alchemist Brotherhood
animes.short_description: Two brothers seek the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemy experiment.

animes.name: Attack on Titan
animes.short_description: Humans fight against giant humanoid creatures known as Titans.

animes.name: One Punch Man
animes.short_description: A superhero with unmatched strength seeks to find a worthy opponent.

animes.name: Naruto
animes.short_description: A young ninja seeks recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage.

animes.name: Dragon Ball Z
animes.short_description: Goku and his friends protect the Earth from powerful villains using martial arts and superpowers.

animes.name: One Piece
animes.short_description: A group of pirates embark on a journey to find the ultimate treasure.

animes.name: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion Vol. 1
animes.short_description: A student gains the power to control people's actions and plans to overthrow the Britannian empire.

animes.name: Hunter x Hunter
animes.short_description: A young boy joins the Hunters, skilled individuals who track down secret treasures and dangerous creatures.

animes.name: Cowboy Bebop
animes.short_description: A bounty hunter and his crew travel the solar system in pursuit of dangerous criminals.

animes.name: My Hero Academia
animes.short_description: A boy with no powers aspires to become the world's greatest superhero.

animes.name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
animes.short_description: A young boy becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and find a cure for his sister, who has turned into a demon.

animes.name: Fairy Tail
animes.short_description: A wizard and his friends take on missions to protect the Kingdom of Fiore and search for the Dragon Igneel.

animes.name: Bleach
animes.short_description: A teenager obtains the powers of a Soul Reaper and battles evil spirits to protect the living world.

animes.name: Sword Art Online
animes.short_description: Players become trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG and must fight to survive and find a way back to the real world.

animes.name: Haikyuu!!
animes.short_description: A high school student joins the volleyball team and aims to compete at the national level.

animes.name: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train
animes.short_description: A demon slayer and his companions board a train to confront a powerful demon.

animes.name: Black Clover
animes.short_description: A boy without magical abilities aspires to become the Wizard King in a world of magic.

animes.name: Oregairu
animes.short_description: A socially isolated student gets involved in a club that helps solve students' problems.

animes.name: The Promised Neverland
animes.short_description: Children living in an orphanage discover a dark secret and plan their escape.

animes.name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
animes.short_description: Members of the Joestar family use their unique powers to battle supernatural threats.

animes.name: Gintama
animes.short_description: A samurai in an alternate world takes odd jobs to make ends meet.

animes.name: Mob Psycho 100
animes.short_description: A young boy with psychic powers tries to control his emotions and navigate through life.

animes.name: Attack on Titan
animes.short_description: Humans fight against giant humanoid creatures called Titans to protect their civilization.

animes.name: Fullmetal Alchemist
animes.short_description: Two brothers seek the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemy experiment.

animes.name: Naruto
animes.short_description: A young ninja dreams of becoming the Hokage, the strongest ninja in his village.

animes.name: One Piece
animes.short_description: A pirate with stretchy abilities searches for the ultimate treasure, One Piece.

animes.name: Death Note
animes.short_description: A high school student discovers a mysterious notebook that can kill anyone whose name is written in it.

animes.name: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion Vol. 2
animes.short_description: A student gains the power to control people's actions and plans to overthrow the Britannian empire.

animes.name: Steins;Gate
animes.short_description: A group of friends discover a way to send messages to the past and alter the course of events.
